name: COVERAGE_3
description: The COVERAGE_3 table contains high-level information on both managed care and indemnity coverage records in your system.

columns.name: CVG_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the coverage record.

columns.name: PAYOR_STATE_C_NAME
columns.description: The state of the coverage payer.

columns.name: PAYOR_ZIP
columns.description: The ZIP code of the coverage payer.

columns.name: PAYOR_PHONE
columns.description: The phone number of the coverage payer.

columns.name: PAYOR_CLAIM_OFC_NUM
columns.description: The claim office number of the coverage payer.

columns.name: REF_PROV_NAME_ID
columns.description: The name of the Health Maintenance Organization's referring physician.

columns.name: REF_PROV_NAME_ID_REFERRING_PROV_NAM
columns.description: The name of the referral source.

columns.name: REF_PROV_CITY
columns.description: The city of the Health Maintenance Organization's referring physician.

columns.name: REF_PROV_ZIP
columns.description: The ZIP code of the Health Maintenance Organization's referring physician.

columns.name: AUTH_NUM
columns.description: The authorization number for this coverage.

columns.name: AUTHORIZATION_DTTM
columns.description: The authorization date and time for this coverage.

columns.name: AUTH_PERSON
columns.description: The name of the person who authorized services for this coverage.

columns.name: VERIF_DATETIME
columns.description: The date and time when authorization was obtained.

columns.name: MED_ASSIST_CARD
columns.description: The medical assistance card number.

columns.name: MED_ASSIST_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description: The medical assistance code.

columns.name: MED_ASSIST_STATUS
columns.description: The medical assistance status.

columns.name: MED_ASSIST_COV_CODE
columns.description: The medical assistance coverage code.

columns.name: IS_CVG_VA_PROG_YN_NAME
columns.description: Indicates if the coverage is for a Veterans' Administration program.

columns.name: IS_MC_PROGRAM_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the coverage is for a managed care program.

columns.name: MC_PRIM_PROV
columns.description: The primary provider for a managed care coverage.

columns.name: MC_AUTH_NUM
columns.description: The authorization number for a managed care coverage.

columns.name: MC_AUTH_PHONE_NUM
columns.description: The authorization phone number for a managed care coverage.

columns.name: TYPE_OF_COVERAGE_C_NAME
columns.description: The type of coverage.

columns.name: ALSO_HAS_MCARE_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the coverage subscriber also has Medicare.

columns.name: MAJOR_MEDICAL_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient has Major Medical coverage.

columns.name: MCAID_GRP_NO_SUF_C_NAME
columns.description: The two letters at the end of the recipient number on the Medicaid card.

columns.name: CHAMPUS_RANK
columns.description: The CHAMPUS/Tricare rank.

columns.name: CHAMPUS_GRADE
columns.description: The CHAMPUS/Tricare grade.

columns.name: BC_BS_CNTRCT_ACCT_C_NAME
columns.description: The contract account name on a Blue Cross/Blue Shield insurance card.

columns.name: MAC_PROV_PHONE_NUM
columns.description: The phone number for the primary provider.

columns.name: MAC_AUTH_CNCT_PRSN
columns.description: The person who provided authorization information for this visit.

columns.name: MAC_COMMENT
columns.description: Comments regarding authorization or denial.

columns.name: MAC_PMP_AUTH_C_NAME
columns.description: The authorization for this visit.

columns.name: MCARE_RR_SUB_NO_P_C_NAME
columns.description: The subscriber number for this managed care coverage.

columns.name: RECIPROCITY_NO
columns.description: The reciprocity number for this coverage.

columns.name: MAC_AUTH_ENT_PRSN
columns.description: The person who entered the authorization number for this managed care coverage.

columns.name: THERAPY_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The therapy type for this coverage.

columns.name: THERAPY_PLAN_DATE
columns.description: The date when the therapy plan was established.

columns.name: THERAPY_START_DT
columns.description: The date when the therapy started.

columns.name: LAST_MENSTRUAL_DATE
columns.description: The patient's last menstrual date.

columns.name: AUTH_VALID_FROM_DT
columns.description: The date when the authorization became valid.

columns.name: AUTH_VALID_TO_DATE
columns.description: The date when the authorization became invalid.

columns.name: COMMERCIAL_AUTH_NUM
columns.description: The commercial authorization number.

columns.name: COMM_AUTH_PRSN
columns.description: The person who authorized the commercial coverage.

columns.name: MC_COBRA_STATUS_YN
columns.description: Indicated whether a managed care coverage has Consolidated Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act status.

columns.name: MC_COBRA_DATE
columns.description: The date when a managed care coverage received Consolidated Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act status.

columns.name: PB_ACCT_CREATED_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether a premium billing account was created for this coverage.

columns.name: ALTR_CVG_ATTN
columns.description: The alternate name of the organization to which claims submitted under this coverage can be sent.

columns.name: ALTR_CITY
columns.description: The alternate city to which claims under this coverage can be sent.

columns.name: ALTR_STATE_C_NAME
columns.description: The alternate state to which claims submitted under this coverage can be sent.

columns.name: ENROLL_REASON_REG_C_NAME
columns.description: The enrollment reason category number for this subscriber with this particular payer or plan.

columns.name: EXT_UPD_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores what kind of change was requested by the external user.

columns.name: EXT_UPDATE_COMMENT
columns.description: This item stores the comment that accompanies the external update request.

columns.name: ENROLL_RECV_DATE
columns.description: The enrollment received date for this coverage.

columns.name: PRIOR_LIS_DATE
columns.description: The most recent LIS period date.

columns.name: ALT_TRANSPLANT_PAYER_OPT_C_NAME
columns.description: Use this item in conjunction with Alternate Payer configuration in the Plan record to help automate claims processing to alternate transplant payers when the relationship between Primary Plan and Alternate Payer/Plan is not 1:1.

columns.name: PB_PAID_THROUGH_DATE
columns.description: The date at which the coverage's premium has been fully paid through.
